metadata.title: CVE-2023-52797 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drivers: perf: Check find_first_bit() return value We must check the returnvalue of find_first_bit() before using the return value as
